posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a lot of 9 postcards from the 1912 Summer Olympics in Stockholm, Sweden.  All are postally used and mailed from Sweden to Hackensack, NJ.

The first 8 are from the 1912 Olympiska Spelens Stockholm-Brekfort series.  This lot, unfortunately does not include the Jim Thorpe postcard, but it does have a few gold, silver, and bronze medalists from the games.  The last postcard is not from the same postcard set, but it does have the same handwriting and postmark as the others.

$SOLD via paypal f/f, check, or M/O.  

First to email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] or PM me with an "I'll take 'em!" will be the new owner.
